::FireBlade::
He  looked up at the incoming Divebomb and the ncaught in the corner
of his eye the enraged IR.  He fired three EMP grenades directly in
IR's path hoping to slow him down enough for Divebomb to get to him....

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
>
> * One of the aotuguns IR had set up turnes on a pivit and aims at
> Firestarter, targeting through her internal system and firing 4 rapid
> charges towards him.
> The second auto gun turns towards Double punch and fires at him
twice before
> moving and aiming towards Manterror and also firing twice.
> The third gun aimed at Sun Crusher and fired 6 times, every one of
the auto
> guns aiming for the chest area.
>
> Iron Raptor shook her head, the feeling of depression lifting with the
> realization that she'd transformed into the nightmare, and her mind
caught
> on too slow to stop the SBM main drive from moving in on her systems.
> Instincts inhanced, muscles became tight and the urge to kill something
> dominated all, though she was still in controle of her body.
> This battle was annoying, and there was always one going on when they
> planned to do something.
> < Never stops. Well, at least it's never boring.>
> She lifted her head and blinked, shaking her head, deciding to set
her rage
> upon the first thing she saw, which was...Divebomb!
> However, by the time her scanners had locked him into targeting she was
> already running past bodies of the enemy and friend, her arms tucked
close
> to her chest.
> She was almost to him before letting out a screech/hiss between her
teeth,
> the scream evening out into a bellow, bearing her teeth...both sets.*
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
